Overview

This dashboard shows Poll Malops overview related to the Cybereason Integration.

The dashboard is made to provide general statistics and show the ingested Poll Malop logs from Cybereason.

It shows the breakdown of poll malops by severity, priority, status, detection type, engine and status. It presents the distribution of poll malop events across last update time. The dashboard also includes the top 10 Root Cause Elements. In addition, it illustrates the affected machines and users.

attributes.title: [Logs Poll Malop] Cybereason
